content:
Set up Salesforce to use shift segments in Shift Scheduling or Workforce Engagement.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Workforce Engagement is available in Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions
Shift Scheduling is available in the Contact Center Stock Keeping Unit (SKU), Einstein 1 Service Edition, and Service Suites

Step 1: Set up Salesforce for Shift Scheduling tools. Ensure shifts, service resources, and Intraday Management Dashboard are associated with the same service territory.

Step 2: Create shift segment types.

Step 3: Add the Shift Segments related list to the Shifts object.

Step 4: Create presence statuses (e.g. Phone Calls, Chats, Team Meeting, or Lunch) to represent activities agents engage in during a shift.

Optional (Workforce Engagement only): Create an approval process and flow for agents to accept and decline shifts. 

Optional (Workforce Engagement only): Follow the Admin Checklist for Intraday Management Setup if using shift segments with Intraday Management.

A shift segment type represents an activity performed by an agent during the workday, such as a work activity (chat, email, or phone call), non-work activity (meeting or training), or break. 

Create Presence Statuses
Automate How Agents Accept and Decline Shift Assignments
Admin Checklist for Intraday Management Setup
title: Shift Scheduling in Salesforce Service Cloud
